Info

Defines class Object2Xml with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates API for writing a configuration/information to a xml file.

class ats_utilities.config_io.xml.object2xml.Object2Xml(configuration_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: ATSChecker

Defines class Object2Xml with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates API for writing a configuration/information to a xml file. Conversion XML to configuration content.

It defines:

attributes:
_FORMAT - Format of configuration content.
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
_file_path - Configuration file path.
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor.
write_configuration - Write configuration to a xml file.
_FORMAT: str = 'xml'¶
write_configuration(configuration: Any | None, verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Write configuration to a xml file.

Parameters:

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

  • configuration – configuration object

Type:

<Any> | <NoneType>

Returns:

True (configuration written to file) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exception:

None
